text: The Skylarks may refer to: *The Skylarks (vocal group), American singing group of the 1940s–1970s *The Skylarks (band), British alternative rock band of 1997–2003 *The Skylarks (South African vocal group), singing group associated with Miriam Makeba ==See also== *Skylarks, 1936 film *Sky Larks, 1934 cartoon
title: The Skylarks
